law.catch_line: Voting by patron members -- Determination of voting power of patron member.

text.section: Except as provided by subsections (2) and (3) of this section, each patron member has one (1) vote.
The organic rules may provide for the allocation of patron member voting power by districts or class, or any combination thereof.

law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 39, effective July 12, 2012.
